name: MegaMarten And The Solar-Powered Super Suction Skateboard!
name_original: MegaMarten And The Solar-Powered Super Suction Skateboard!
description:
A single-player game made for the #WarOnPlastics game jam.

MegaMarten has created a super-suction skateboard from rubbish dumped in the forest by humans. Your task is to guide MegaMarten and clean up the forest without damaging the other residents or becoming poisoned.

Image by David Mark from Pixabay
